##What are $\redC{\text{lines}}$ and $\purpleD{\text{line segments}}$ and $\blueD{\text{rays}}$?

A $\redC{\text{line}}$ extends forever in both directions, like this:   
![](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/5fade265560eb6d89d57fb526850e0652b812127.png)  

A $\purpleD{\text{line segment}}$ is just part of a line. It has two endpoints, like this:   
![](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/a26f5a5d1677c840eb556ced719307a3de52c26f.png)  

A $\text{\blueD{ray}}$ starts at one point and continues on forever in one direction, like this:  
![](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/5578ab3d6a0f66440403ed77729d93697631d889.png)

*Want to learn more about lines, line segments, and rays?  Check out [this video](/v/lines-line-segments-and-rays).*

##Practice set 1: Identify lines, line segments, and rays

[[☃ graded-group-set 2]]

*Want to try more problems like this? Check out [this exercise](/e/recognizing_rays_lines_and_line_segments).*

gradedGroups.content:
**Which of the following figures show a dashed $\greenD{\text{green ray}}$?**  
Consider the *entire* dashed green structure in each figure. 

[[☃ radio 1]]

hint.content:
A *ray* starts at one point and goes on forever in one direction, like this:  
![](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/5578ab3d6a0f66440403ed77729d93697631d889.png)

आकृति $C$ एक dashed $\greenD{\text{green ray}}$ को दर्शाती है।

gradedGroups.title: Problem 1A

gradedGroups.content:
**What is the dashed $\greenD{\text{green}}$ part of the figure below?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/fb11381095d8a882a362a00d6b1fd9308514875b)

hint.content:
The dashed $\greenD{\text{green}}$ part of the diagram is part of a line that starts at one point and ends at another point, like this:  

![](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/a26f5a5d1677c840eb556ced719307a3de52c26f.png)

एक सीधी, ज्यामितीय आकृति जो एक बिंदु से शुरू होती है और दूसरे बिंदु पर उसका अंत होता है, वह एक *रेखाखंड* कहलाती है।

dashed $\greenD{\text{green}}$ आकृति एक रेखाखंड है।

gradedGroups.title: Problem 1B

gradedGroups.content:
**Which of the following lines appear in the diagram below?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/831b2d43f3e66fb74d8420c9ca58914e90177ec9)

hint.content:
A *line* extends forever in both directions.  

For example, $\overleftrightarrow{XY}$ names a line that passes through point $X$ and point $Y$, extending forever in either direction:

![](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/7fd0cc1f9f0cda87f8cc97412c5e18e8a6b69648.png)

चलिए प्रश्न में दिए गए चित्र में आकृतियों को देखते हैं, एवं यह ज्ञात करते हैं कि वह रेखा हैं या नहीं।

$\greenD{\overleftrightarrow{DE}}$ passes through point $\greenD{D}$ and point $\greenD{E}$, extending forever in both directions.  So, it is a line.

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/1df9330fb58bd9a83e6d4a6946868849cf4ea7bd)

Line $\greenD{\overleftrightarrow{DE}}$ is in the diagram.

gradedGroups.title: Problem 1C

choices.content: $\overleftrightarrow{BC}$, एक रेखा है जो बिंदु $B$ और $C$ से होकर गुजरती है।
$\overleftrightarrow{DE}$, एक रेखा है जो बिंदु $D$ और $E$ से होकर गुजरती है।
$\overleftrightarrow{BD}$, एक रेखा है जो बिंदु $B$ और $D$ से होकर गुजरती है।

Here's what it looks like after making one line go though points $\text{A}$ and $\text{D}$.

gradedGroups.content:
**Move the ray so it has an endpoint at point $\text{A}$ and goes through point $\text{B}$. Then complete the statement below.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

This is a ray because it has [[☃ dropdown 1]], and it continues forever in [[☃ dropdown 2]].

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/c96999b0ce9783c3fc2af3eefed5d2de18b2c6f7)

**Use the line segments to connect all possible pairs of the points $\text{A}$, $\text{B}$, and $\text{C}$. Then complete the statement below. **
